sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is distributive over intersection.
message_1: Let A be the set {1,2} and B be the set {x,y}. Find the Cartesian product of A and B. Then, let C be the set {2,x} and D be the set {2,y}. Find the Cartesian product of C and D. Finally, show that (A ∩ C) × B = (A × B) ∩ (C × B).
